data.title: Explore SILAPATHAR NAGAR LPS School
data.meta_description: SILAPATHAR NAGAR LPS is a Co-educational school located in the DHEMAJI block of DHEMAJI district in Assam. data.text:
SILAPATHAR NAGAR LPS is a Co-educational school located in the DHEMAJI block of DHEMAJI district in Assam. Established in 1964, it is managed by the Department of Education and serves students from class 1 to class 5. The school is located in a rural. It does not have a pre-primary section. Assamese is the medium of instruction at SILAPATHAR NAGAR LPS. The school is accessible by all weather road and academic sessions begin in April.

The school has a Government building. It has 8 classrooms in good condition. There is a separate room for the headmaster/teacher Hedges. The school does not have an electric connection. The source of Drinking Water in the school is Hand Pumps and it is functional. The school has 1 boys toilet and has 2 girls toilet and and it is functional. It have playground and no computers for teaching and learning. However, the school does have a library with 121 books and provides mid-day meals. The disabled students does need ramps to access classrooms. The school does not have a computer-aided learning lab.
